revision.text:
{{Infobox Key Item |name = Holo Caster |image = [[File:Holo caster.png]] |caption = The ''Holo Caster''. |use = A device that allows users to see and track [[Achievements]]. |obtain = Capture 110 or more different Pokémon }} ===Description=== A device that allows users to see and track [[Achievements]]. Completing Achievements gives useful bonuses. ===Acquisition=== Capture 110 different Pokémon. When this is complete, the Holo Caster will be granted by Professor Oak and the Achievement modal will be unlocked on the game interface. ===Effects=== You will now have the Achievement Modal to easily open the Achievements menu and track your progress of an achievement.


{{Key Items}}
[[Category:Key Items]] [[Category:Items]]
